name: Jump the Shark Vs. Lug the Slug
name_original: Jump the Shark Vs. Lug the Slug
description:
Fight the Slug; Save the Kingdom

This is an entry for GoGodotJam3 CLASSIC. The theme is "Evolution." My intention was to have multiple battles with evolving strategies. But that scope was too large.

If you want to be overly gracious to me, though, this is a (small) evolution of my GoGodotJam3 ULTRA, "Too Much Power", entry, which can be found here:

https://gotm.io/bunnytrail/jump-vs-slug

Controls:

You can use arrow keys and spacebar/enter, or a gamepad. Or you can click on the characters with a mouse or poke them on a touchscreen.
